TEXT.English: Click on title to search updates
TEXT.French: Click on title to search updates
TEXT.German: Auf Titel klicken um nach Updates zu suchen.
TEXT.Italian: Click on title to search updates
TEXT.Spanish: Click on title to search updates

TEXT.English: Updating successful. Please restart Civ4 to apply changes.
TEXT.French: Updating successful. Please restart Civ4 to apply changes.
TEXT.German: Aktualisierung erfolgreich. Es ist ein Neustart erforderlich um die Änderungen zu übernehmen.
TEXT.Italian: Updating successful. Please restart Civ4 to apply changes.
TEXT.Spanish: Updating successful. Please restart Civ4 to apply changes.

TEXT.English: Updating failed. [NEWLINE]Visit [LINK=%s1_url]mod homepage[\LINK] for manual installation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If you use Linux/Wine:[NEWLINE]Unzipping the update manually will resolve the issue in most cases.
TEXT.French: Updating failed. [NEWLINE]Visit [LINK=%s1_url]mod homepage[\LINK] for manual installation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If you use Linux/Wine:[NEWLINE]Unzipping the update manually will resolve the issue in most cases.
TEXT.German: Update fehlgeschlagen. [NEWLINE]Bitte [LINK=%s1_url]Mod-Webseite[\LINK] besuchen und manuell aktualisieren.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Falls du Linux/Wine benutzt:[NEWLINE]Rufe das Verzeichnis dieser Mod auf und entpacke das Update-Zip manuell.
TEXT.Italian: Updating failed. [NEWLINE]Visit [LINK=%s1_url]mod homepage[\LINK] for manual installation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If you use Linux/Wine:[NEWLINE]Unzipping the update manually will resolve the issue in most cases.
TEXT.Spanish: Updating failed. [NEWLINE]Visit [LINK=%s1_url]mod homepage[\LINK] for manual installation.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If you use Linux/Wine:[NEWLINE]Unzipping the update manually will resolve the issue in most cases.
